    • Method Detail

      • timer

        public static void timer()
        Creates timer, based on System.currentTimeMillis(). Using the constant variable startTime and subtracting that from System.currentTimeMillis() to store the time passed by since the start of the game.

      • enterClick

        public static boolean enterClick(org.newdawn.slick.GameContainer gc)
        boolean method that listens to key click. (ENTER)
        Parameters:
        gc, - Game functionality library included in the Slick2D engine.
        Returns:
        true/false

      • GUIRenderZero

        public static void GUIRenderZero(org.newdawn.slick.Graphics g,
                 int screenWidth,
                 int screenHeight)
        void method for rendering GUI needed for gameState 0.
        Parameters:
        g, - Graphics rendering library included in the Slick2D engine.
        screenWidth, - the width of the game screen, used in the method to display the graphics in relation to the width.
        screenHeight, - the height of the game screen, used in the method to display the graphics in relation to the height.

      • GUIRenderTwo

        public static void GUIRenderTwo(org.newdawn.slick.Graphics g,
                int score,
                int screenWidth,
                int screenHeight)
        void method for rendering GUI needed for gameState 2.
        Parameters:
        g, - Graphics rendering library included in the Slick2D engine.
        score, - the score integer is used for displaying the score.
        screenWidth, - the width of the game screen, used in the method to display the graphics in relation to the width.
        screenHeight, - the height of the game screen, used in the method to display the graphics in relation to the height.
